description:
After tragically losing his father, Pierrot still carries on with the contest. But Shadow from Team America promises to reunite Pierrot with his mother with his Go-pan! Can Go-Pan send Pierrot to the Milky Way to meet his mother who died and became a star?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Blasting Off into Space!! The Man Who Succeeds Go-pan!
En route vers les étoiles ! L`héritier du go-pan !
Uchuu o Miseru!! Gopan o Tsugu Otoko!
มองเห็นอวกาศ!! ชายผู้สืบทอดโกปัง!
宇宙を魅せる!! ゴぱんを継ぐ男!
